**Tender Announcement: Indigenous Cultural Reintegration Support Services**

**Title:** Indigenous Cultural Reintegration Support Services

**Reference Number:** cb-5494-97593164

**Publication Date:** May 12, 2023

**Expected Contract Start Date:** June 1, 2023

**Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2026

**Notice Type:** Advance Contract Award Notice

**Procurement Method:** Advance Contract Award Notice

**Trade Agreements:** None

**Regions of Opportunity:** New Brunswick

**Regions of Work:** New Brunswick

**Contracting Entity Name:** Correctional Service Canada

**Contracting Entity Address:** 1045 Main Street, 2nd Floor, Moncton, NB E1C 1H1

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Claudia Landry
* Email: claudia.landry@csc-scc.gc.ca
* Phone: (506) 378-8722
* Fax: (506) 851-6327

**Tender Description:**

Correctional Service Canada is seeking a contractor to provide cultural reintegration support services to Indigenous offenders residing at the Parrtown Community Correctional Centre, Hart House Community Residential Facility, Carleton Center Community Residential Facility for Women, and Island View Community Based Residential Facility in New Brunswick. The contractor will provide traditional teachings, ceremonies, spirituality, and guidance to Indigenous offenders on parole in the Saint John and Fredericton areas.

**Minimum Essential Requirements:**

* The contractor must be recognized by their community as an Elder/Cultural Advisor
* The contractor must have at least 5 years of experience providing spiritual and cultural services to Indigenous people
* The contractor must be familiar with multiple ceremonies and be able to provide guidance to staff and offenders on the use and disposal of traditional medicines and spiritual effects

**Statement of Capabilities:**

Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified to provide the services described in this notice may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person identified above on or before the closing date and time. The statement of capabilities must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the requirements outlined in this notice.

**Contract Period:**

The contract will be from the date of award to March 31, 2024, with an option to extend for two additional 1-year periods.

**Estimated Contract Value:**

$141,970.14 (GST/HST extra
